name: Fizzy Ginger Lemonade
description: Fizzy, tart, with just a hint of ginger spice.
recipeIngredient: 2-inch knob ginger, peeled and cut into small chunks
1 cup fresh juice from 10 to 12 lemons

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ginger, lemon juice, sugar, salt, and water in a blender. Blend on high speed for 1 minute. Strain through a fine mesh strainer into a pitcher. Add club soda and ice and stir to combine. Serve immediately in ice-filled glasses.
